settings.heading: Recommended Use
settings.content:
Wherever possible, catch spots early, as soon as you feel that tell-tale tingle under the skin. Have some patches handy in case!

Leave on for at least 2 hours, ideally overnight. The hydrocolloid patch can be left on longer to protect the spot from touching and getting infected.

One application is usually enough to stop most spots. However for deeper, more stubborn spots a second application may be needed.

settings.heading: More Info
settings.content:
Each microneedle is made from high-quality ingredients to tackle untimely breakouts and deep-rooted spots. Salicylic acid is known for its ability to unblock pores, purify and sooth irritation. Totarol, derived from an indigenous New Zealand tree, is rich in antioxidants with antimicrobial properties known for strengthening the skin’s defences against toxins to prevent further breakouts. Green tea extract is renowned for its ability to break down bacteria, clear pores and cleanse the skin, while also reducing redness.

Our effective and easy-to-use pimple patches deliver precisely where it’s needed most, whether it’s breakout zones or solitary spots. Simply place the patch on the target area and press gently, then let the microneedles do their magic.

settings.title: Precision Delivery System
settings.text:
Topical skincare products need sophisticated delivery systems, penetration enhancers and carriers like oil and water (which dilute the formula) just for any of their actives to get through to the epidermis. 

Our MicroCrystals are our delivery system. Painlessly punching through that brick wall-like stratum corneum so the active formula can dissolve directly, deeper in the skin.

settings.title: Spot-Busting Formulation
settings.text: 500 MicroCrystals on each patch. The concentrated formula of salicylic acid, totarol, green tea extract and hyaluronic acid melts into skin, purifying spots from within. Reduces the appearance of spots, soothes skin and reverses breakouts.

settings.title: Visible Results
settings.text: Designed for hormonal zits, early-stage pimples and deep under-the-skin spots. With noticeable changes in size, colour and pressure. Get to work from just two hours.

settings.review: Super simple to use and dramatic difference in pimple size overnight. Cannot live without these now!

I love these miracle patches! I have suffered with adult hormonal cystic acne for ages now and have tried everything (or so I thought) these are so easy to use and made a huge difference in stopping the spots coming out to their worst (normally they are so painful) I used a patch two nights in a row and then from then the spots cleared up so much quicker on their own (reducing redness and inflammation).

settings.title: Vegan
settings.text: All our products are suitable for vegans and cruelty free

settings.title: No Nasties
settings.text: Free from parabens, preservatives, fragrance, phthalates and sulphates

settings.title: Ultra-Low Water
settings.text: Our dissolving microneedles don’t need water or oil as a carrier

settings.title: Totally Painless
settings.text: Just the gentle sensation of the microneedles getting to work.

settings.quote: THESE SPOT STICKERS ARE SO DAMN EFFECTIVE THAT THEY KEEP SELLING OUT.

settings.text:
Crystallised serum

Our MicroCrystals are crystallised, concentrated serums. No oil and only the absolute minimum of water. No filler, just killer ingredients.

Rooted in medicine

First developed to deliver painless, effective drugs and vaccines, we’ve worked with K-beauty scientists to create our precision microneedle skincare.

Painless pyramid crystals

Perfectly shaped to painlessly push through the skin’s outer layer and deliver the maximum of good stuff to the skin cell-producing epidermis.

Fast-melting

Unlike topical creams, masks and serums our ingredients dissolve directly into the deeper skin layers, to get to work from just two hours.

settings.title: Salicylic Acid
settings.text: A staple when it comes to blemish-prone skin, salicylic acid is known for its ability to help unclog pores, reduce bacteria and sooth swollen skin.

settings.title: Totarol
settings.text: Totarol’s antibacterial superpowers are well-known, reinforcing the skin’s natural defences against toxins and UV damage.

settings.title: Green Tea Extract
settings.text: A powerful antioxidant known to unclog pores and eliminate surplus sebum, disinfects the skin and soothes irritation all-in-one.

settings.heading: What are microneedles?
settings.content: Microneedles are – quite literally – microscopic needles made from crystallised serum of our skin-boosting ingredients. When the microneedles meet the skin the needles fully dissolve releasing the ingredients beneath the skin where they can be most effective delivering powerful and longer-lasting results.

settings.heading: Do Microneedle Patches Hurt?
settings.content: No, microneedle patches are completely painless. Microneedles used in at-home procedures are much smaller than those used by dermatologists, making them safe and straightforward to use. You may feel a slight sensation when you first press the patch onto the skin, followed by a warm tingle as the microneedles begin to dissolve.

settings.heading: Can I reuse Spot Stoppa patches?
settings.content: No, each patch is single use. Each microneedle is made from active ingredients crystalised into a serum. When the microneedles meet the skin the needles fully dissolve releasing the ingredients into the skin where they can be most effective.

settings.heading: What type of spots are Spot Stoppa patches for?
settings.content: Our Spot Stoppa patches are designed for early-stage, upcoming pimples that haven’t yet surfaced, deep under-the-skin spots, and stubborn unidentifiable hormonal zits.

settings.heading: How long will it take to see results?
settings.content: We appreciate that results may differ person-to-person, however our patches are designed to get to work after just two hours to visibly reduce the appearance of blemishes by decreasing size, reducing redness, soothing irritation, and replenishing the skin.

settings.heading: When should I apply my Spot Stoppa patches?
settings.content:
Use our Spot Stoppa patches as soon as you feel the tingle of an early-stage pimple. This is the best time to catch them and avoid the pimple coming to a head.

You can also use our advanced pimple patches on established spots, where the microneedle technology and formula helps to visibly reduce the appearance of blemishes by decreasing size, reducing redness and sooth irritation.

settings.heading: Can I use Spot Stoppa with other products?
settings.content: Our pimple patches are easy to fit into your existing routine. It’s important that they are applied to clean, dry skin and not layered over other topical products such as moisturisers or serums.

settings.heading: How do I apply my Spot Stoppa Patches?
settings.content:
Spot Stoppa patches should always be applied to clean dry skin, before using any topical ingredients such as moisturisers or serums.

It’s important to leave the patches on for two hours to allow the ingredients to fully dissolve and get to work. For best results, we recommend applying before bed and wearing overnight for that ‘I-woke-up-like-this’, clear-skin feeling.

settings.heading: When I remove the Spot Stoppa patch, there is sometimes an outline left on my skin. Is this normal?
settings.content: Yes, this is totally normal and should fade within an hour

settings.heading: Are Spot Stoppa patches vegan?
settings.content: Yes. Our pimple patches only use vegan ingredients.

settings.heading: What makes Spot Stoppa patches different from cheaper alternatives?
settings.content:
Our products have been designed for all skin types. The patch itself is a medical grade hydrocolloid base that gently extracts impurities and protects against further inflammation. The pyramids are infused with crystallised salicylic acid, totarol, and green tea extract to tackle even the most stubborn spots.

They’re also boosted with hyaluronic acid, which is incredibly gentle and poses low risk of irritation as the body naturally produces this ingredient.

We do understand that skin sensitivity varies from person-to-person and if you’re unsure of how you will react to these ingredients, try a patch test on the back of your hand before applying to your face.

settings.heading: What age do you have to be to use Spot Stoppa?
settings.content: We know acne isn’t just for teenagers, so we made sure anyone can use our microneedle patches. Spot Stoppa is suitable for all ages and all skin types.
